title: Al-Fiqh al-Manhaji
text:
Al-Fiqh al-Manhaji

A Systematic Manual According to the Madhhab of Imam al-Shafi’i
by Dr. Mustafa al-Khin, Dr. Mustafa Dib al-Bugha, and Dr. Ali al-Sharbaji
(c) 2025 Liban Hussein
This project is a work-in-progress collection of notes and commentary based on the lectures of Shaykh Mahdi Lock on the Shafi’i madhhab, using Al-Fiqh al-Manhaji as the core text.
The goal is to make the content more accessible for English-speaking students by organizing the material into structured, annotated entries while remaining faithful to the source. Where beneficial, cross-references will be added from other relevant Shafi’i works, such as Taqrirat al-Sadidah, and the broader tradition of usul and fiqh.







Quote




كنت أصفح الورقة بين يدي مالك صفحا رفيقا هيبة له، لئلا يسمع وقعها
“I used to turn the page gently in front of Malik out of reverence for him, lest he hear its sound.”
— Imam al-Shafi’i
